Verses: 1 paththaam Varusham Paththaam Maadham Pannirandaanthedhiyile Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

2 manupuththirane, Nee Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvonukku Edhiraaga Un Mugaththaith Thiruppi, Avanukkum Egipthu Muzhuvadhukkum Virodhamaaith Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu, Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal:

3 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvone, Nee Un Nadhigalin Naduvile Paduththukkondu En Nadhi Ennudaiyadhu, Naan Adhai Enakkaaga Undupanninen Endru Sollugira Periya Mudhalaiye, Idho, Naan Unakku Virodhamaai Vandhu,

4 un Vaayile Thuradugalai Maatti Un Nadhigalin Machchangalai Un Sedhilgalil Ottikkollumpadi Seydhu, Unnai Un Nadhigalin Naduvilirundhu Thookkividuven; Un Nadhigalin Machchangalellaam Un Sedhilgalil Ottikkondirukkum.

5 unnaiyum Un Nadhigalin Ellaa Machchangalaiyum Vanaandharaththile Pottuviduven; Vettaveliyile Vizhuvaai; Nee Serththukkollappaduvadhillai; Unnai Boomiyin Mirugangalukkum Aagaayaththin Paravaigalukkum Iraiyaagak Koduppen.
6 appozhudhu Egipthudhesaththin Kudigalellaarum Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal; Avargal Isravel Vamsaththaarukku Naanarkolaayirundhaargale.
7 avargal Unnaik Kaiyile Pidikkumpodhu, Nee Odindhupoi, Avargal Vilaavaiyellaam Pilappaai; Avargal Unmel Saayumpodhu, Nee Murindhu, Avargal Iduppu Muzhuvadhaiyum Maraththuppogappannuvaai.
8 aagaiyaal Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Idho, Naan Unmel Pattayaththaivarappanni, Unnil Manusharaiyum Mirugangalaiyum Sangaarampannuven.
9 egipthu Dhesam Paazhum Vanaandharamumaagum; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal Nadhi Ennudaiyadhu, Naan Adhai Undaakkinen Endru Sonnaane.

10 aagaiyaal, Idho, Naan Unakkum Un Nadhigalukkum Virodhamaaga Vandhu, Mikdholmudhal Eththiyoppiyaavin Ellaiyilulla Sevenevaraikkum Egipthudhesaththai Avaandharamum Paazhumaana Vanaandharangalaakkuven.
11 manushanudaiya Kaal Adhaikkadappadhumillai Mirugajeevanudaiya Kaal Adhai Midhippadhumillai; Adhu Naarpadhu Varusham Kudiyatrirukkum.

12 egipthudhesaththaip Paazhaaippona Dhesangalin Naduvile Paazhaaippogappannuven; Adhin Pattanangal Avaandharamaakkappatta Pattanangalin Naduvile Naarpadhuvarusham Paazhaaikkidakkum; Naan Egipthiyarai Jaadhigalukkulle Sidharadiththu, Avargalai Dhesangalukkulle Thootrividuven.
13 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Naarpadhuvarusham Mudiyumpodhu, Naan Egipthiyarai Avargal Sidharundirukkira Janangalidaththilirundhu Serththukkondu,
14 egipthiyarin Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppi, Avargalai Avargaludaiya Jananadhesamaagiya Padhros Dhesaththile Thirumbivarappannuven; Ange Avargal Arpa Raajyamaayiruppaargal.
15 adhu Ini Jaadhigalinmel Thannai Uyarththaamal, Matra Raajyangalilum Arpamaanadhaayirukkum; Avargal Ini Jaadhigalai Aalaadhapadikku Avargalaik Kurugippogappannuven.

16 avargalin Pirage Poi, Avargalai Nokkikkondirukkiradhinaal Isravel Vamsaththaar Enakkuth Thangal Akkiramaththai Ninaippoottaadhapadikku, Ini Avargal Ivargaludaiya Nambikkaiyaayiraamarpovaargal; Appozhudhu Naan Karththaraagiya Aandavar Endru Arindhukolvaargal Engiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
17 irubaththezhaam Varusham Mudhalaam Maadham Mudhalaanthedhiyile, Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

18 manupuththirane, Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Theeruvin Munne Than Senaiyinidaththil Kadum Oozhiyam Vaanginaan; Ovvoru Thalaiyum Mottaiyaayitru; Ovvoru Tholpattaiyin Tholum Urindhupoyitru; Aanaalum Avan Theeruvukku Virodhamaaga Seydha Oozhiyaththinaale Avanukkaavadhu Avan Senaikkaavadhu Kooli Kidaikkavillai.

19 aagaiyaal Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Idho Naan Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarukku Egipthudhesaththaik Kodukkiren; Avan Adhin Eraalamaana Janaththai Siraipidiththu Adhin Aasthiyai Sooraiyaadi Adhin Kollaipporulai Eduththukkolvaan; Idhu Avanudaiya Senaikkuk Kooliyaayirukkum.
20 avan Adhile Seydha Velaikku Egipthudhesaththai Naan Avanukkuk Kooliyaagak Koduththen; Enakkaaga Adhai Seydhaargalendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
21 annaalile Naan Isravel Vamsaththaarin Kombai Mulaikkappanni, Avargal Naduvile Dhaaraalamaaip Pesum Vaayai Unakkuk Kattalaiyiduven; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal Endraar.
